description: A succulent lamb recipe that is packed with herbal aromas and flavour.
keywords: Roast lamb,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Rack Of Lamb with A Herb Crust Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Bake the lamb in the oven on a baking tray for 10 minutes.

In a mixing bowl, combine the rest of the ingredients until they are mixed fully. Remove the lamb from the oven and evenly spread the crumb mix on top of the meat. Ensure the mix is pressed hard onto the meat.
Place the crusted lamb back into the oven and bake for a further 25 minutes or as per desired temperature before serving.
